contentrichtext.text: {{about|the light rail station in Dallas, Texas|the rail station in London, England|Hampton railway station}} {{Infobox Station | name= Hampton | type= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit|DART]] [[light rail]] station | image= Hampton Station 2.jpg | image_size= 260 | image_caption= A southbound train at the station | address= 2002 South Hampton Road<br>Dallas, Texas 75224 | coordinates={{coord|32|43|35|N|96|51|19.5|W|type:railwaystation_region:US-TX|display=inline,title}} | line= {{rail color box|system=DART|line=Red}} | other=DART Routes {{DART LB|42}}, and {{DART LB|453}} | platform= 2 [[side platforms]] | structure=At grade | parking=514 free spaces, no overnight | bicycle= 4 lockers, 1 rack | passengers= | pass_year= | pass_percent= | opened= June 14, 1996<ref name="June 15, 1996">{{cite news |first=Curtis|last=Howell |coauthors=Mark Wrolstad |work=The Dallas Morning News |title=Now Boarding: Rail debut has crowds lining up |date=June 15, 1996}}</ref> | rebuilt= | ADA= true | code= | owned= [[Dallas Area Rapid Transit]] | zone= | services= {{s-rail|title=DART}} {{s-line|system=DART|line=Red|previous=Westmoreland|next=Tyler/Vernon}} }} '''Hampton''' is a [[DART Light Rail]] station located in the [[Oak Cliff]] neighborhood of [[Dallas, Texas|Dallas]], [[Texas]] ([[United States|USA]]) at Hampton Road and Wright Street. It opened on June 14, 1996 and is a station on the {{DART R}}, serving the nearby [[YWCA]] and [[Sunset High School (Dallas)|Sunset High School]]. == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.dart.org Dallas Area Rapid Transit] - [http://www.dart.org/riding/stations/hamptonstation.asp Hampton Station] [[Image:Hampton Station 1.jpg|thumb|left|307px|Passengers waiting at the station]] {{Dallas Area Rapid Transit}} {{tram-stub}} [[Category:Dallas Area Rapid Transit light rail stations]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1996]]
